Okay, Bossman, but JP was throwing his weight around when I didn't even know
what I did! He never even told me! Now what did I do?...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 08, 2000 2:28 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Enough!
>
> I get home to recieve 50 new emails, out of which at least 30 were
> complaints. I do agree with Inferno, though, the whole council should
decide
> before booting someone.
>
> Thecode, Inferno, JP, and KSLawdogg, if you guys could tell me when you
are
> available for a chat session, we could meet and give Thecode the benefit
of a
> doubt, and perhaps let him and us explain a few things.
>
> Thecode, if you could send me an email about who exactly I did nothing
about
> that moded, I'll see if I missed something or if you have the wrong
> definition of moding.
>
> And finally, please send further arguments over private email, no one
wants
> to read tons of arguments. Thanx.
>
